sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: RUYSSELÈDE or Ruisselède, a market-town of Belgium, in the province of West Flanders, 15 miles south-east of Bruges. It is best known as the seat of a great reformatory for boys, founded by the Government in 1849. The population was 6663 in 1874, and 6670 in 1881.
